chinese.title: 精采
chinese.describe_text: 充滿樂趣，爆炸性的擴香度檸檬，葡萄柚和紅色水果的開端相互玩耍和追逐，直到它們到達中心生薑和粉紅胡椒刺激你的嗅覺使你的露出最真實的情緒結局值得回憶琥珀和麝香的香調為日本扁柏場景一種令人驚奇的日本木材乾燥、清新、神秘
chinese.flavor: 前調：檸檬、柚子。中調：生薑、紅胡椒。後調：琥珀、日本扁柏、麝香。

english.title: Brilliant
english.describe_text: Full of fun, explosive spreads of lemon, grapefruit and red fruits start to play and chase each other until they reach the center of ginger and pink pepper to stimulate your sense of smell to make your true emotional endings worth remembering amber and musk A scent of Japanese cypress scene, an amazing Japanese wood that is dry, fresh and mysterious
english.flavor: Top notes: lemon, grapefruit. Middle notes: ginger, red pepper. Base notes: amber, Japanese cypress, musk.

chinese.title: 冥想
chinese.describe_text: 花束宣示著與新鮮的佛手柑一同到來多汁的檸檬、藏紅花的辛辣把這些想法融合在一起開啟了一個期望憑藉感性擁抱的心靈思想被轉化為行動沒藥開始與伊蘭伊蘭共舞背景是祕魯聖木這是印加巫師在宗教儀式的精華基底令人心碎和無法估量的深度具有香草的甜美、檀香的激情提醒人們，期待的真正樂趣是在期待中
chinese.flavor: 前調：香檸檬、檸檬、藏紅花。中調：綠檀木、依蘭、沒藥。後調：香草、安息香脂、琥珀、檀香木。

english.title: Meditation
english.describe_text: The bouquet declares that the juicy lemon and saffron together with the fresh bergamot combine these ideas to open up a mind that is expected to be transformed into action by the emotional embrace. The beginning of the dance with Ilan Ilan is Peruvian sacred wood is the heart of the Inca sorcerer in the ritual of the heartbreaking and incalculable depth of vanilla sweetness, sandalwood passion to remind people, the real pleasure of expectation is in anticipation
english.flavor: Top notes: bergamot, lemon, saffron. Middle notes: green sandalwood, ylang ylang, myrrh. Base Notes: vanilla, benzoin, amber, sandalwood.

chinese.title: 彼此
chinese.describe_text: 強烈都會男性香靈感來自繁華都市的社交晚會、街頭文化香水中檸檬和葡萄柚的香氣與芳香的香草混合在一起就像雞尾酒伴隨著米蘭的電動夜晚一樣艾蒿和菖蒲摩擦出一種深色調的「苦澀」
chinese.flavor: 前調：葡萄柚、柑橘、粉紅胡椒。中調：芫荽、菖蒲、苦艾。後調：香根草、勞丹脂、龍涎香。

english.title: Each Other
english.describe_text: Inspired by the social evenings of the bustling city, the fragrance of lemon and grapefruit in the street culture perfume is mixed with the aromatic vanilla. Like a cocktail accompanied by the electric night in Milan, the mugwort and calamus rubbed a dark tone. Bitter
english.flavor: Top notes: grapefruit, citrus, pink pepper. Middle notes:  calamus, absinthe. Base Notes: vetiver, labdanum, ambergris.

chinese.title: 紫渙
chinese.describe_text: 當風推開秋天的大門時，悠悠帶著成熟的葡萄味，甜美的氣味如珍珠的完美，吸引我們的感官，當他親吻那些品嘗果實的嘴唇，生命的快樂依附於植物的卷鬚，流入成千上萬種顏色的細微差別，從金色到最深的紫羅蘭再到充滿笑聲和歡樂的色彩，興高采烈地大聲說出，敘述了生活的純粹美，GRAPE PEARLS是生命之歌和正能量
chinese.flavor: 前調：花香、藍莓。中調：葡萄、葡萄葉、玫瑰、咖啡。後調：琥珀、香草、麝香。

english.title: Grape Perls
english.describe_text: When the wind pushes the door of autumn, the long taste of ripe grapes, the sweet smell like the perfection of pearls, attracts our senses. When he kisses the lips that taste the fruit, the happiness of life depends on the tendril of the plant. The nuances of thousands of colors, from gold to the deepest violets to laughter and joyful colors, eloquently speak out, telling the pure beauty of life, GRAPE PEARLS is the song of life and positive energy
english.flavor: Top notes: floral, blueberry. Middle notes: grapes, grape leaves, roses, coffee.Base Notes: amber, vanilla, musk

chinese.title: 愜意
chinese.describe_text: 柏樹碩大的樹枝陰影帶來了一絲安心，讓靈魂煥然一新，象徵永恆的女性之美的，繪出男人和女人之間最純粹的紐帶，是女人，女兒，伴侶或朋友，令人驚訝的水彩色調，彰顯了最華麗的自然力量，無限的光彩，有自信的讓大自然的擁抱，慢慢地走在一排綠色的柏樹的陰影中，CYPRESS SHADE 永遠是那當你迷途時的避風港
chinese.flavor: 前調：檸檬、香檸檬、橘子、八角。中調：苦橙葉、含羞草、芫荽、薄荷。後調：雪松、香根草。

english.title: Cypress Shade
english.describe_text: The shadow of the cypress tree branches brings a touch of peace, a new look to the soul, symbolizing the beauty of eternal women, drawing the purest bond between men and women, a woman, daughter, partner or friend, surprising watercolor shades, Highlighting the most gorgeous natural forces, infinite brilliance, confidently letting nature embrace, slowly walking in the shadow of a row of green cypress trees, CYPRESS SHADE is always the safe haven when you are lost
english.flavor: Top notes: lemon, bergamot, orange, star anise. Middle notes: bitter orange leaves, mimosa, alfalfa, mint. Base Notes: cedar, vetiver.

chinese.title: 精采
chinese.describe_text: 充滿樂趣，爆炸性的擴香度檸檬，葡萄柚和紅色水果的開端相互玩耍和追逐，直到它們到達中心生薑和粉紅胡椒刺激你的嗅覺使你的露出最真實的情緒結局值得回憶琥珀和麝香的香調為日本扁柏場景一種令人驚奇的日本木材乾燥、清新、神秘
chinese.flavor: 前調：檸檬、柚子。中調：生薑、紅胡椒。後調：琥珀、日本扁柏、麝香。

english.flavor: Top notes: grapefruit, citrus, pink pepper. Middle notes:  calamus, absinthe. Base Notes: vetiver, labdanum, ambergris.

chinese.title: 紫渙
chinese.describe_text: 當風推開秋天的大門時，悠悠帶著成熟的葡萄味，甜美的氣味如珍珠的完美，吸引我們的感官，當他親吻那些品嘗果實的嘴唇，生命的快樂依附於植物的卷鬚，流入成千上萬種顏色的細微差別，從金色到最深的紫羅蘭再到充滿笑聲和歡樂的色彩，興高采烈地大聲說出，敘述了生活的純粹美，GRAPE PEARLS是生命之歌和正能量
chinese.flavor: 前調：花香、藍莓。中調：葡萄、葡萄葉、玫瑰、咖啡。後調：琥珀、香草、麝香。

english.title: Grape Perls
english.describe_text: When the wind pushes the door of autumn, the long taste of ripe grapes, the sweet smell like the perfection of pearls, attracts our senses. When he kisses the lips that taste the fruit, the happiness of life depends on the tendril of the plant. The nuances of thousands of colors, from gold to the deepest violets to laughter and joyful colors, eloquently speak out, telling the pure beauty of life, GRAPE PEARLS is the song of life and positive energy
english.flavor: Top notes: floral, blueberry. Middle notes: grapes, grape leaves, roses, coffee.Base Notes: amber, vanilla, musk

chinese.title: 愜意
chinese.describe_text: 柏樹碩大的樹枝陰影帶來了一絲安心，讓靈魂煥然一新，象徵永恆的女性之美的，繪出男人和女人之間最純粹的紐帶，是女人，女兒，伴侶或朋友，令人驚訝的水彩色調，彰顯了最華麗的自然力量，無限的光彩，有自信的讓大自然的擁抱，慢慢地走在一排綠色的柏樹的陰影中，CYPRESS SHADE 永遠是那當你迷途時的避風港
chinese.flavor: 前調：檸檬、香檸檬、橘子、八角。中調：苦橙葉、含羞草、芫荽、薄荷。後調：雪松、香根草。

english.title: Cypress Shade
english.describe_text: The shadow of the cypress tree branches brings a touch of peace, a new look to the soul, symbolizing the beauty of eternal women, drawing the purest bond between men and women, a woman, daughter, partner or friend, surprising watercolor shades, Highlighting the most gorgeous natural forces, infinite brilliance, confidently letting nature embrace, slowly walking in the shadow of a row of green cypress trees, CYPRESS SHADE is always the safe haven when you are lost
english.flavor: Top notes: lemon, bergamot, orange, star anise. Middle notes: bitter orange leaves, mimosa, alfalfa, mint. Base Notes: cedar, vetiver.

chinese.title: 精采
chinese.describe_text: 充滿樂趣，爆炸性的擴香度檸檬，葡萄柚和紅色水果的開端相互玩耍和追逐，直到它們到達中心生薑和粉紅胡椒刺激你的嗅覺使你的露出最真實的情緒結局值得回憶琥珀和麝香的香調為日本扁柏場景一種令人驚奇的日本木材乾燥、清新、神秘
chinese.flavor: 前調：檸檬、柚子。中調：生薑、紅胡椒。後調：琥珀、日本扁柏、麝香。

english.title: Brilliant
english.describe_text: Full of fun, explosive spreads of lemon, grapefruit and red fruits start to play and chase each other until they reach the center of ginger and pink pepper to stimulate your sense of smell to make your true emotional endings worth remembering amber and musk A scent of Japanese cypress scene, an amazing Japanese wood that is dry, fresh and mysterious
english.flavor: Top notes: lemon, grapefruit. Middle notes: ginger, red pepper. Base notes: amber, Japanese cypress, musk.

chinese.title: 冥想
chinese.describe_text: 花束宣示著與新鮮的佛手柑一同到來多汁的檸檬、藏紅花的辛辣把這些想法融合在一起開啟了一個期望憑藉感性擁抱的心靈思想被轉化為行動沒藥開始與伊蘭伊蘭共舞背景是祕魯聖木這是印加巫師在宗教儀式的精華基底令人心碎和無法估量的深度具有香草的甜美、檀香的激情提醒人們，期待的真正樂趣是在期待中
chinese.flavor: 前調：香檸檬、檸檬、藏紅花。中調：綠檀木、依蘭、沒藥。後調：香草、安息香脂、琥珀、檀香木。

english.title: Meditation
english.describe_text: The bouquet declares that the juicy lemon and saffron together with the fresh bergamot combine these ideas to open up a mind that is expected to be transformed into action by the emotional embrace. The beginning of the dance with Ilan Ilan is Peruvian sacred wood is the heart of the Inca sorcerer in the ritual of the heartbreaking and incalculable depth of vanilla sweetness, sandalwood passion to remind people, the real pleasure of expectation is in anticipation
english.flavor: Top notes: bergamot, lemon, saffron. Middle notes: green sandalwood, ylang ylang, myrrh. Base Notes: vanilla, benzoin, amber, sandalwood.

chinese.title: 彼此
chinese.describe_text: 強烈都會男性香靈感來自繁華都市的社交晚會、街頭文化香水中檸檬和葡萄柚的香氣與芳香的香草混合在一起就像雞尾酒伴隨著米蘭的電動夜晚一樣艾蒿和菖蒲摩擦出一種深色調的「苦澀」
chinese.flavor: 前調：葡萄柚、柑橘、粉紅胡椒。中調：芫荽、菖蒲、苦艾。後調：香根草、勞丹脂、龍涎香。

english.title: Each Other
english.describe_text: Inspired by the social evenings of the bustling city, the fragrance of lemon and grapefruit in the street culture perfume is mixed with the aromatic vanilla. Like a cocktail accompanied by the electric night in Milan, the mugwort and calamus rubbed a dark tone. Bitter
english.flavor: Top notes: grapefruit, citrus, pink pepper. Middle notes:  calamus, absinthe. Base Notes: vetiver, labdanum, ambergris.

chinese.title: 紫渙
chinese.describe_text: 當風推開秋天的大門時，悠悠帶著成熟的葡萄味，甜美的氣味如珍珠的完美，吸引我們的感官，當他親吻那些品嘗果實的嘴唇，生命的快樂依附於植物的卷鬚，流入成千上萬種顏色的細微差別，從金色到最深的紫羅蘭再到充滿笑聲和歡樂的色彩，興高采烈地大聲說出，敘述了生活的純粹美，GRAPE PEARLS是生命之歌和正能量
